name: Kulter (Basunat) (Basunat)
description:
Free until October 30, 2022

Kulter is an atmospheric RPG, with elements of survival horror, dark and dungeon-crawler. 

The gamer playing Kulter has to make important decisions that will affect the development of the story.  Several routes and endings. 

Kulter is a dystopian exploration adventure with agile turn-based combat (CTB system).

+100 enemies and skills. 4 hours of duration. 

Kulter is an unforgettable visual, sound and life experience. 

Playable with keyboard and mouse or gamepad in windowed or full screen.

Versión de Kulter en español:

Kulter (ESP) by Basunat (itch.io)
